name: Survivors Warfare
description:
Invade the base of your rivals with your heavily equipped army. Get set! the war between the good and evil is about to begin. Fight the evil with your spirits and guns. go out and beyond your imagination and live the fantasy of being a hero to fight the war against ever growing evil. there's nothing grey in the world its either good or bad. choose your sides well & strike the red vs blue war now.
Explore different destinations and find your enemy to finish him off!
Keep your riffles and guts on the ready for the day of war has now dawned!

Features:
- Lot of challenging tasks
- Excellent real look 3D environment
- Simple and easy to play
- Pixel Graphics & awsome Characters
- Survival gun game against epic enemies
- Equip variety of weapons
- Challenging and Epic Ranked Battles game
- Fantastic cubic graphics offer a new experience in unaware adventures
